trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the image.
trans-unit.target: 指定影像的檔案格式。

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class indicate image formats such as bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), enhanced metafile (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), and icon (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>類別會指出映像格式，例如點陣圖 (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>)，增強型中繼檔 (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>)，和圖示 (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify an image format when saving an image using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用的屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>類別，以指定的影像格式儲存映像使用時<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can compare two image formats by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由比較兩個映像格式<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that specifies a particular image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，指定特定的影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 結構，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Typically you use the static properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify a particular format such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, rather than constructing a new <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會使用的靜態屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>類別來指定特定的格式，例如<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>，而不是建構新<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap (BMP) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得點陣圖 (BMP) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the bitmap image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示點陣圖影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the enhanced metafile (EMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得增強型中繼檔 (EMF) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the enhanced metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示增強型中繼檔影像格式。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回數值，表示指定物件是否為等於這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是相當於這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Exchangeable Image File (Exif) format.
trans-unit.target: 取得可交換影像檔 (Exchangeable Image File，Exif) 格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Exif format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 Exif 格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示這個物件的雜湊程式碼值。

trans-unit.source: A hash code that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得圖形交換格式 (GIF) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the GIF image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 GIF 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Windows 圖示影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 Windows 圖示影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the JPEG image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 JPEG 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: 取得記憶體中點陣圖的格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示記憶體中點陣圖的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得 W3C 可攜式網路圖形 (W3C Portable Network Graphics，PNG) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the PNG image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 PNG 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得標記的影像檔案格式 (Tagged Image File Format，TIFF) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the TIFF image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 TIFF 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件轉換成人們可讀取的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows metafile (WMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Windows 中繼檔 (WMF) 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> 物件，表示 Windows 中繼檔影像格式。
